Created attachment 25300
Change installer wording as described

I found the Service option text in the Windows installer a bit unclear:

Service: Automatically start Tomcat when the computer is started.

This could mean that the service won't be installed if the box is not selected.

It might be clearer if the option were renamed "AutoStart", and the core description updated to state that the service is created.
creator: sebb@apache.org
markt@apache.org
text: Thanks. Patch applied to trunk (with one additional word). Will be included in 7.0.1 onwards.
